data: When I opened the door to my secretary’s office, I could see her looking up from her desk at the Swami’s face with an expression of fascinated skepticism.
When I opened the door to my secretary's office, I could see her looking up from her desk at the Swami's face with an expression of fascinated skepticism.
Clifton, Mark, 1906-1963; Van Dongen, H. R., 1920-2010 [Illustrator]
